mapper.select: SELECT APPOINTMENT_NO, EMPLOYEE_NO, EMPLOYEE_NAME, DEPARTMENT, POSITION, APPLY_DATE, NOTE, APPOINTMENT_DIVISION, APPLY_STATUS FROM PERSONAL_APPOINTMENT ORDER BY APPOINTMENT_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PERSONAL_APPOINTMENT( APPOINTMENT_NO, EMPLOYEE_NO, EMPLOYEE_NAME, DEPARTMENT, POSITION, APPLY_DATE, NOTE, APPOINTMENT_DIVISION, APPLY_STATUS ) VALUES( #{appointmentNo}, #{employeeNo}, #{employeeName}, #{department}, #{position}, #{applyDate}, #{note}, #{appointmentDivision}, #{applyStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PERSONAL_APPOINTMENT SET APPOINTMENT_NO =#{appointmentNo}, EMPLOYEE_NO =#{employeeNo}, EMPLOYEE_NAME =#{employeeName}, DEPARTMENT =#{department}, POSITION =#{position}, APPLY_DATE =#{applyDate}, NOTE =#{note}, APPOINTMENT_DIVISION=#{appointmentDivision}, APPLY_STATUS =#{applyStatus} WHERE APPOINTMENT_NO =#{appointmentNo} AND EMPLOYEE_NO =#{employeeNo}
